answers.answer: My last was born with a hemangioma and it's kinda like that but not raised. If that makes more sense
It's not a stretch mark I have stretch marks lol. It's actually running into a stretch mark.

Has ur urine been fine? Only thimg i could think of is these tiny red dots that look like broken blood vessels called petechiae. Its a sign of preeclampsia. Im no professional though so dont take my word for it. May be something like psoriasis also.
Really? I've had minimal protein in my pee since 14 weeks. And headaches that won't go away even with fluids or iv meds. They said it's just a migraine though. There's only one spot so far :/
Also my bp has had fluctuations from 80/50 (rest) - 140/90 (active-doing groceries)
Could it be a boil? If so you should go get it checked out because chances are they may have to lance it.
It's not a boil I get boils and ingrown hair like weekly. This is under the skin and not raised
Also it doesn't change colour/Blanche when pressed on
Yeah...i mean I would get it checked out if it doesnt go away. :/ hopefully its not that, but if it is, its good to catch it early. Take care.
Thanks for the help!! I'm going to call my ob in the morning for sure. I have my next apt in 7 days but don't want to miss it if it's something serious.

question: So I'm 20.5 weeks and I just noticed a fairly small spot on my stomach (not showing yet) it's really red and not raised. It kinda looks like a broken blood vessel but it's not a bruise- it's kind of hard to explain. It's not itchy either. Has anyone had anything similar before? What could it be? Also the edges are rigid not smooth and it's a weird shape not a circle
title: Spot on stomach
